table_info.name: learner
table_info.description: This table contains general information about learners.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: This column contains the first name of a learner. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: This column contains the last name of a learner. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: email
columns.description: This column contains the email address of a learner. It is a unique field and does not contain any null values.

columns.name: password
columns.description: This column contains the password of a learner. It is a unique field and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: system_log
table_info.description: This table contains information of system logging activity of learners such as logins and signups.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: action
columns.description: This is an enumeration type column which stores three values only related to actions performed by learners: 'Signup', 'Login', 'ContentAccessed'. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: This column stores DATETIME type data and is a default column where for every new record, GETUTCDATE() function is called to insert a value for this column. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: learner_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learner' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: module
table_info.description: This table contains general information about modules.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: name
columns.description: This column contains the name of a module. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: description
columns.description: This column contains the description of a module. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: lesson
table_info.description: This table contains general information about lessons of modules.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: title
columns.description: This column contains the title of a lesson. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: description
columns.description: This column contains the description of a lesson. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: module_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'module' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: learning_outcome
table_info.description: This table contains general information about learning outcomes.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: description
columns.description: This column contains the description of a learning outcome. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: lesson_learning_outcome
table_info.description: This table contains information about the relationship between lessons and learning outcomes.

columns.name: lesson_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'lesson' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

columns.name: learning_outcome_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_outcome' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: cognitive_level
table_info.description: This table contains different Blooms Taxonomy cognitive levels.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: level
columns.description: This is an enumeration type column which stores seven values only related to cognitive levels: Remember', 'Understand', 'Apply', 'Analyze', 'Evaluate', 'Create'. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: learning_outcome_cognitive_level
table_info.description: This table contains information about the relationship between learning outcomes and cognitive levels.

columns.name: learning_outcome_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_outcome' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

columns.name: cognitive_level_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'cognitive_level' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: learning_material
table_info.description: This table contains information about learning materials associated with lessons.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: lesson_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'lesson' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: lecture
table_info.description: This table contains information about lectures, which is a type of learning material.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_material' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: sub_lecture
table_info.description: This table contains information about sub-lectures of lectures.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: title
columns.description: This column contains the title of a sub-lecture. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: content
columns.description: This column contains the content of a sub-lecture. It may contain null values.

columns.name: lecture_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'lecture' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: tutorial
table_info.description: This table contains information about tutorials, which is a type of learning material.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_material' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: tutorial_question
table_info.description: This table contains information about questions and associated answers of tutorials.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: question
columns.description: This column contains the question of a tutorial. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: answer
columns.description: This column contains the associated answer for a question of a tutorial. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: tutorial_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'tutorial' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: labsheet
table_info.description: his table contains information about labsheets, which is a type of learning material.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_material' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: labsheet_question
table_info.description: This table contains information about questions and associated answers of labsheets.

columns.name: id
columns.description: This is the primary key column which auto-increments its value by 1 for each new record. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: question
columns.description: This column contains the question of a labsheet. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: answer
columns.description: This column contains the associated answer for a question of a labsheet. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: labsheet_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'labsheet' table. It does not contain any null values.

table_info.name: interaction
table_info.description: This table contains information about interactions of learners with learning materials.

columns.name: learner_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learner' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

columns.name: learning_material_id
columns.description: This is a foreign key column which references the 'id' column of the 'learning_material' table. It is also a key attribute and does not contain any null values.

columns.name: interaction_type
columns.description: This is a enumeration type column which stores three values only related to interaction types between learners and the system: 'QuestionAsked', 'Hinted', 'Guided'. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: interaction_response
columns.description: This column contains the response based on the interaction. For example, this response could be an answer given by the learner or a hint provided by the system. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: attempts
columns.description: This column contains the number of attempts for a learning material by a learner. For example, this could be the number of a times a learner has accessed a lecture or attempted a tutorial. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: learning_level
columns.description: This is an enumeration type column which stores three values only related to learning level of learners: 'Beginner', 'Intermediate', 'Advanced'. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: completion_status
columns.description: This column contains the completion percentage of a learning material by a learner. For example, if a learner completes 2 out of 5 questions in a tutorial, the completion percentage would be 40. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: date
columns.description: This column stores the date of an interaction and is a default column where for every new record, GETDATE() function is called to insert a value for this column. It does not contain any null values.

columns.name: time_spent
columns.description: This column stores the time duration for an interaction. It does not contain any null values.
